trans-unit.source: The Azure Storage services are regularly updated with support for new features.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Storage services are regularly updated with support for new features.

trans-unit.source: The Azure Storage services REST API reference describes each supported version and its features.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Storage services REST API reference describes each supported version and its features.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you use the latest version whenever possible.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you use the latest version whenever possible.

trans-unit.source: For information on the latest version of the Azure Storage services, as well as information on previous versions, see [Versioning for the Azure Storage Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dd894041.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For information on the latest version of the Azure Storage services, as well as information on previous versions, see [Versioning for the Azure Storage Services](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dd894041.aspx).
